MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the TD8 postcode area of Jedburgh, affecting properties in Lanton and surrounding areas. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1.45PM due to repairs required to our overhead line network following a bird strike. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 3.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 1.49PM on 30 January 2021.
